p: In a univariate analysis, we found an association between having a chronic HBV infection and longer time to virus clearance. The small number of patients infection (two) does not permit any firm conclusions, but a similar association has previously been reported for SARS‐CoV‐infected patients. 25 T cell dysfunction in responses to other viruses in patients with chronic HBV infections 26 might explain the longer virus clearance time in patients with COVID‐19, and this association merits further study.
